opis: *** Villa s pogledom na more *** ~ Vila: 247m2, zemljište 391m2 ~ Parking ~ 3 mjesta ~ Orijentacija na jugoistoku ~ 3 etaže, 5 soba, 5 toliet-kupaonica ~ Ova prostrana 247 m2 vile nalazi se na samoj obali pružajući svojim gostima zadivljujući pogled na more ~ Prizemlje se sastoji od elegantnog dnevnog boravka / blagovaonice ukrašene najvišom pažnjom i potpuno opremljene kuhinje. Ima izravan pristup terasi s beskonačnim bazenom i vrtom s šarmantnim otvorenim kaminom. Možete uživati u jelima na natkrivenoj terasi i tradicionalnom kamenom stolu ~ Za plivati u Jadranskom moru samo trebate prijeći ulicu ispred ville ~ Villa nudi 5 dvokrevetnih spavaćih soba, od kojih 4 imaju vlastite kupaonice. Sve 4 sobe imaju TV, klima uređaj i balkon s pogledom na more NAPOMENA: Agencijska provizija za kupca: 3% ***Villa with Sea View*** ~Villa:247m2, land 391m2 ~Parking space area~3 marking places ~Orientation South East ~3 floors, 5 rooms, 5 toliet-bathrooms ~This spacious 247 square meter Villa is located on the very coast providing its guests an amazing sea view ~Ground floor consists of a stylish living/dining room decorated with upmost care and fully equipped kitchen. It has a direct access to the terrace with infinity pool and a garden with charming open fire place. You can enjoy your meals at the covered terrace, sitting on traditionally made stone table ~To swim in the Adriatic Sea you only need to cross the street in front of your vacation home ~Villa offers 5 double bedrooms, 4 of them having ensuite bathrooms. All 4 rooms have a TV, air conditioning device and balcony with breath-taking sea view 21.REAL ESTATE & TOURISM CENTURY d.o.o. www.21stcroatia.com Marmontova 5 21 000 Split CROATIA NOTE: Agency commission for the buyer: 3%
